item.title: Everyone look please
item.dc:creator: @Ledgend Ledgend
item.description:
@Ledgend wrote:

No I mean put the code into the sub catergory like this

//Ixuascape 2006
//JimmyCo

------- Top Of Client ---------

// -- Attack
// -- Strength
     // -- Max hit

Etc Etc..

Midway through the client

// -- Strength

public class Strength
{
 CODE, CODE , CODE
}

// -- Strength Max hit

public class StrengthMaxHit
{
 CODE,CODE, CODE
}

I no nothing about Java

Like that I dont mean just listing the thing I mean like make a contents list at the top
And put the code in the catergories in the client so that its easier to find and edit

Read full topic

item.title: Everyone look please
item.dc:creator: @Ledgend Ledgend
item.description:
@Ledgend wrote:

Hi guys I have a real important question


//IxuaScape Client Coded By JimmyCo
//Made For IxuaScape 2006

//EasY-EDiT Client,By JimmyCo

//IMPORTS
//START
//SKILL
   // -- ATTACK
          // -- WEAPONS
   // -- STRENGTH
          // -- DAMAGE
   // -- DEFENCE
          // -- DAMAGE DEDUCTION
          // -- ARMOUR
          // -- SHIELDS
   // -- RANGING
          // -- BOWS
          // -- ARROWS
          // -- CROSSBOWS
          // -- BOLTS
   // -- PRAYER
          // -- BONES
          // -- AURAS
   // -- MAGIC
          // -- RUNES
          // -- ARMOUR
          // -- STAFFS
          // -- SPELLS
          // -- TELEPORTS
   // -- RUNECRAFT
          // -- TALISMANS
          // -- TIARAS
          // -- POUCHES
   // -- CONSTRUCTION
          // -- PLAYER HOUSE TELEPORT
          // -- PLANK CONVERSION
   // -- HITPOINTS
          // -- HEALTH METER
   // -- AGILITY
          // -- STAMINA
          // -- SHORTCUTS
          // -- COURSES
   // -- HERBLORE
          // -- UNIDS
          // -- POTIONS
          // -- CONSUMABLE
   // -- THIEVING
          // -- PICKLOCK
          // -- PICKPOCKET
          // -- STALL STEALING
   // -- CRAFTING
   // -- FLETCHING
   // -- SLAYER
   // -- HUNTER
   // -- MINING
   // -- SMITHING
   // -- FISHING
   // -- COOKING
   // -- FIREMAKING
   // -- WOODCUTTING
   // -- FARMING
//COMBAT
   // -- ANIMATION
   // -- SPECIAL ATTACKS
   // -- RANGING
   // -- STYLES
          // -- STAB
          // -- IMPALE
          // -- SLASH
          // -- BLOCK
          // -- SPIKE
          // -- SMASH
//DUELLING
   // -- DUEL ARENA
   // -- RULES
   // -- ADD RIGHT CLICK FUNCTION (DUEL ANYWHERE}
//CASTLE WARS
   // -- HELMS AND CAPES
   // -- SCORES
   // -- MEDIPACKS
   // -- BARRICADES
   // -- BOMBS
//NPC
   // -- SPAWNS
   // -- SPEECH
   // -- MENTALITY
//RANDOMS
   // -- MIME
   // -- SHADE
   // -- ZOMBIE
//FOOD
   // -- CONSUMABLE
//PLAYER COMMANDS
   // -- ::MAX ME
   // -- ::GOLDGUY
   // -- ::2BIL

People at Mopar i think you see what im asking… Is it possible to put all the data into catergories
Like that? Or does it have to be in the format that the current clients are at.

P.S I dont care how much work it is just is it possible??
Ofc they wont be the catergories I will put them into just used as an example

This well help noobs to edit a server when they download it

Read full topic
